utils.checkpoint_manager module

Checkpoint Manager - AI PPT Assistant Implements checkpoint and recovery functionality for long-running tasks

class utils.checkpoint_manager.CheckpointManager(timeout_manager=None)[源代码]

基类：object

Checkpoint manager for handling task state persistence and recovery

Features: - Automatic checkpoint creation at key stages - State persistence in DynamoDB with S3 backup for large data - Recovery point detection and restoration - Progress tracking and resumption - Cleanup of expired checkpoints
